timeline.bodyText:
Maybe

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		ARG 0 level
          
          
            
            		ARG 0 litLevel
          
      
    
    
  

as the result function only returns this level when the block state has "lit" property's value equal to "true"
timeline.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: createPiston(Block), as this returns a ready-to-go PistonBlock than just a Block/AbstractBlock.Settings
timeline.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: Also createLog(Block), same reasoning as piston, returns a ready-to-go PillarBlock
timeline.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: Same, create(Nether)Stem(Block) (the sound group refers to "nether stem")
timeline.author: liach
